TopicTitle: KASRA - Kerbal Aeronautics and Space Research Agency

Articles.Content:
I proudly announce the launch of KASRA, a community of Kerbal Space Program players that play different roles in a mission. Whether you want to be a rocket engineer, a mission controller or an Astronaut, KASRA is the place for you. Using a combination of KMP, Mechjeb and Telemachus, we can recreate the real process of a daring space mission, from the design of the rocket to take off!!! Check out the website for more information. This community adds a lot more to the experience Kerbal Space Program gives you.

http://kasraforksp.wix.com/kasra

See you soon!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
